SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into eb_article (id, cid, title, author, image_input, synopsis, share_title, share_synopsis, visit, sort, url, status, add_time, hide, admin_id, mer_id, is_hot, is_banner, ctime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{synopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareSynopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hide,jdbcType=BIT}, #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isBanner,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update eb_article set cid = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_input = #{imageInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, synopsis = #{synopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_title = #{shareTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_synopsis = #{shareSynopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit = #{visit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hide = #{hide,jdbcType=BIT}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mer_id = #{merId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_hot = #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT}, is_banner = #{isBanner,jdbcType=BIT}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, cid, title, author, image_input, synopsis, share_title, share_synopsis, visit, sort, url, status, add_time, hide, admin_id, mer_id, is_hot, is_banner, ctime from eb_article where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
